front.title: Identity-Based Encryption (IBE) Cipher Suites for Transport Layer Security (TLS)

abstract.t: This document describes a new key exchange method, Identity-BasedEncryption (IBE) for the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol.This memo specifies an alternative method for transmitting premastersecret securely between the client and server in a TLS handshakeprocess. Some new cipher suites are thus introduced into TLSprotocol.
